guideline: Initiate therapy with ACE inhibitors or ARBs. Target BP <130/80 mmHg for patients with diabetes.
First-line therapy: Metformin. Target HbA1c <7% for most adults.
High-intensity statin therapy for ASCVD risk >7.5%. Target LDL <70 mg/dL for high-risk patients.
Stepwise approach: Start with low-dose ICS + SABA PRN. Add LABA for persistent symptoms.
